EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Parametrix_Darold Woodward_MBO Partners (1316708463.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Darold,
Thank you for letting me know. Have you let Parametrix know about putting the process on hold, or would you like me to still work on the contract if they respond to me? Please let me know.
Thank you and let me know if you have any questions or I can help you out with anything.
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Darold Woodward [mailto:darold66@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, September 22, 2011 11:46 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Parametrix_Darold Woodward_MBO Partners
Thank you Nicolette.
I have a couple of things developing personally and will be putting this process on hold for a couple of weeks.
I have a couple of full-time employment offers and need to work with those employers to evaluate the best path forward.
Thanks for your help so far.
Regards,
Darold On Tue, Sep 20, 2011 at 12:06 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Charlie, Thank you for the follow up. Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be happy to speak with you.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: Charlie Dougherty [mailto:CDougherty@parametrix.com] Sent: Tuesday, September 20, 2011 1:58 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Darold Woodward Subject: RE: Parametrix_Darold Woodward_MBO Partners
Hi Nicolette – Thank you for your emails. I’ve gotten some preliminary feedback on the contract, but am waiting for some additional folks to comment. I will be in touch with you when I know more.
Thanks Charlie
From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Tuesday, September 20, 2011 9:28 AM To: Charlie Dougherty Cc: Darold Woodward Subject: FW: Parametrix_Darold Woodward_MBO Partners
Hi Charlie,
I hope your week is going well so far. I wanted to follow up with you on the contract I sent over on Thursday on behalf of Darold Woodward. I wanted to first see if you had any questions about the contract and then also see what the status of your review is. I would be happy to answer any questions you have and give you further information on MBO Partners if you would like.
I look forward to hearing from you, have a great day!
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Thursday, September 15, 2011 5:30 PM To: 'cdougherty@parametrix.com' Cc: 'Darold Woodward' Subject: Parametrix_Darold Woodward_MBO Partners
Hi Charlie,
My name is Nicolette and I am an Enrollment Advisor with MBO Partners. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. If you have 10 minutes I would love to share some background on our organization and also understand your business to ensure we process everything according to the way you would like.
Attached is the standard agreement we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you.
For more information on MBO Partners click here: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf
You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I look forward to speaking with you
Have a great day, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners

From: John Fittipaldi [mailto:johnfitti@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, September 07, 2011 11:39 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Julie Macdonald Winbush Subject: Re: MBO Partners Enrollment Information
Nicolette,
OK, I had a substantial conversation with Marstel Day this morning. It appears that they will want to establish a working consultative relationship with me.
Juli MacDonald Winbush will be the point of contact for Marstel Day with MBO Partners.
I've completed the enrollment process and signed the agreement. The proverbial ball is now in your court. Please advise if I can answer any questions that might arise.
Regards,
John
From: "ntaylor@mbopartners.com" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: johnfitti@yahoo.com Sent: Tuesday, September 6, 2011 6:03 PM Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear John, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become a MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. Please begin enrollment by clicking here. Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns. We look forward to working with you. Regards, Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6281 Toll Free: 800-556-0270 MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300 Herndon, VA 20171 http://www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
